messages.message:
Hello!
I am a fan on Lou Adler.  As I look for jobs to apply for, I am seeing a lot of problems getting stuck in the HR Blackhole.  You company looks like you are on to something with hiring.  I have 2 questions that I believe can lead to the perfect candidates for every position:
1: "What is your ambition or hobbies outside of work"
2: "Do you have any questions about our company"
I believing having this simple conversation can lead to the right answers from a candidate.  Staffing takes way too long, and I look forward to hearing back from you.  If you have a need for an experienced software developer, I would love to meet for lunch.  Thank you!

Can you send a resume and I can forward it to our AZ team? 
Jeremy@hiringsolved.com
Absolutely.  Thank you for the connect!
Just in case you didn't see the email, I got an auto-reply.
